broadwick.stochastic

Class StochasticSimulator.ThetaQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.stochastic.StochasticSimulator.ThetaQueue
  • Enclosing class:
    StochasticSimulator

    private class StochasticSimulator.ThetaQueue
extends Object
    Manages the registered theta events. Each registered theta event is stored in a table containing the time of the event the list of observers for that event and the list of events for that time.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • pushTheta

        public void pushTheta(double time,
             Observer obs,
             Object theta)
        Add a new theta event to the registry, including the time, collection of observers and collection of events. Each event is stored as an object where it is assumed that the observer
        Parameters:
        time - the time the theta event occurs.
        obs - the observers.
        theta - the theta event.

      • getNextEventDataAndRemove

        public Map<Observer,Collection<Object>> getNextEventDataAndRemove()
        Get the next observer and the collection of events they are subscribed to and remove it from the theta queue.
        Returns:
        a map of the observers and their subscribed data.
